Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Tritium^reset; to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
You can generate a lot of power with a ^orange;Fission Reactor^reset; in your lab. Show you can make one using your ^orange;Power Station^reset; and bring me some ^orange;Tritium^reset;.
^orange;Tritium^reset; is actually quite useful, you can throw it in a centrifuge or use it for fuel.
